00069 class MessageHookListIterator
00070 {
00071 public:
00073     MessageHookListIterator() : entry(0) {}
00075     void First() { entry = MessageHookList::m_message_hook_list.GetFront(); }
00077     void Next() { entry = entry->GetNext(); }
00079     BOOLEAN IsDone() { return (entry == 0); }
00081     MessageHookReferrer* GetCurrentItem() { return (entry); }
